casebody.data:
CRIEGO-EL
v.
STATE. No. 50P12-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Ovarias Verdad Criego-EL, Blanch, for Criego, Ovarias Verdad. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of July 2015 by Plaintiff for Judicial Notice:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
